question: Jake has 36 comic books. His brother has 15 more comic books than Jake. How many comic books do they have altogether?
response:
Jake has 36 comic books, and his brother has 15 more comic books than Jake, so his brother has 36 + 15 = 51 comic books.
Altogether, Jake and his brother have 36 + 51 = 87 comic books.
The answer is 87.
